forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, a blanket of partially cloudy skies invites a serene calm, tempered by a cool breeze whispering from the west. The air hangs at a refreshingly mild temperature, offering comfort yet hinting at the crispness typical of this coastal city. While the night reveals itself without the brush of fog obscuring the iconic outlines of the Golden Gate, there's a lingering softness to the horizon—perhaps the marine layer that dances in and out along the edges of this vibrant metropolis.

Tomorrow promises a cozy embrace of sunshine, brightening the day with clarity that allows the city’s charms to shine through with unapologetic allure. As the sun arcs towards its zenith, temperatures are expected to only modestly climb before settling into a comfortable warmth. It’s a splendid day for a casual stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely lunch at an outdoor café where the atmosphere beckons a sense of community — perhaps a chance to people-watch or simply savor the moment. Attire should skew towards layers, welcoming a light cardigan or a stylish jacket for when the wind picks up, ensuring a pleasant outing without the chill. Embrace the delight of the day, letting the essence of San Francisco wrap around you as you explore its streets and parks.
